name: AIDENT SOCIAL WELFARE ORGANISATION
briefDescription: AIDENT-Social Welfare Organisation (ASWO) is a not for profit, non- political, organization established by a group of people representing different social and professional streams.  This organization came into being with the idea of working towards the overall development of the marginalized section of the society in all spheres. The basic philosophy of ASWO is to use Education, Health and means of livelihood as the basic enablers to help the target population.Thematic issues/ priorities —•	Education•	Public Health•	Women & Child •	Livelihood & Sustainable development.
